question:
####[UFAQ 24](https://ancur.wikia.com/wiki/Reign_and_Reverie_UFAQ) [Michael Boggs]
If the Runner uses credits from [Flame-out](/en/card/21109) to use Ika, and then moves Ika off of Flame-out, is Ika still trashed at the end of the turn?
answer:
No.

Audited by Null Signal Rules (2022.06).
